Title: The Harbinger
Description:
We are in need of your aid once more, champion. A mysterious figure moves within the shadows. The Harbinger...

Let us speak in the Chamber of the Guardian. I've asked Alleria to meet us there as well.
ObjectivesText: Meet Khadgar and Alleria in the Chamber of the Guardian in Dalaran.

Objectives.Text: Approach the Chamber of the Guardian
